response.explain: From the provided information, the robot has already moved close to the fridge. The next step according to the initial subtask plan should be to open the fridge. Considering the distance from the robot to the fridge is more than one meter, the robot needs to move closer to the fridge before attempting to open it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot closer to the fridge (within one meter range).
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take out the brisket from the fridge.
(4) Move the robot to the front of the oven.
(5) Open the oven.
(6) Put the brisket inside the oven.
(7) Close the oven.
(8) Cook the brisket.
(9) Open the oven.
(10) Take out the brisket.
(11) Move the robot back to its original position.
response.code:
